item.title: Why The Time Is Now To Join The Mobile Revolution
item.description: You have probably heard the phrase “Timing is everything.” For the success of a business or a product, this is especially true. Launching the right product at the right time all but ensures success – heck, even launching the wrong product at the right time will give the product a better-than-even chance for success. But the right product at the wrong time usually ends in failure.
